description: An AWS Support App resource that creates, updates, lists and deletes Slack channel configurations.

TeamId.description: The team ID in Slack, which uniquely identifies a workspace.
TeamId.markdownDescription:
The team ID in Slack, which uniquely identifies a workspace.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 256  

Pattern: ^\S+$  

Update requires: No interruption

ChannelId.description: The channel ID in Slack, which identifies a channel within a workspace.
ChannelId.markdownDescription:
The channel ID in Slack, which identifies a channel within a workspace.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 256  

Pattern: ^\S+$  

Update requires: No interruption

ChannelName.markdownDescription:
The channel name in Slack.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 256  

Pattern: ^.+$  

Update requires: No interruption

NotifyOnCreateOrReopenCase.description: Whether to notify when a case is created or reopened.
NotifyOnCreateOrReopenCase.markdownDescription:
Whether to notify when a case is created or reopened.

---

Required: No

Type: boolean     

Update requires: No interruption

NotifyOnAddCorrespondenceToCase.description: Whether to notify when a correspondence is added to a case.
NotifyOnAddCorrespondenceToCase.markdownDescription:
Whether to notify when a correspondence is added to a case.

---

Required: No

Type: boolean     

Update requires: No interruption

NotifyOnResolveCase.description: Whether to notify when a case is resolved.
NotifyOnResolveCase.markdownDescription:
Whether to notify when a case is resolved.

---

Required: No

Type: boolean     

Update requires: No interruption

NotifyOnCaseSeverity.description: The severity level of a support case that a customer wants to get notified for.
NotifyOnCaseSeverity.markdownDescription:
The severity level of a support case that a customer wants to get notified for.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

ChannelRoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that grants the AWS Support App access to perform operations for AWS services.
ChannelRoleArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that grants the AWS Support App access to perform operations for AWS services.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 31  

Maximum Length: 2048  

Pattern: ^arn:aws[-a-z0-9]*:iam::[0-9]{12}:role\/(.+)$  

Update requires: No interruption
